summary.para: Used by the function to describe a single interface.

remarks.para: Note Prior to Windows Vista, QITAB was not declared in a public header file. To use it in those cases, you must use define it yourself as it is given here. Under Windows Vista, QITAB is included in Shlwapi.h and this is not necessary.
To mark the end of a QITAB table, set the piid member to NULL and the dwOffset member to 0. See the function for an example of how to use this structure.

summary.para: A pointer to the IID of the interface represented by this structure.
The offset, in bytes, from the base of the object to the start of the interface.
